propositions.text: The Emperor's ambition was to conquer the world.
He was only in his teens, but he was already a hero.
He said that he would find his own happiness.
He was not afraid of anything.
He thought that he was a man of virtue.
He was a master of martial arts.
He thought that he was a good person.
He said, "Forget it, just forget it."
He knew that if she was a daughter, she would be a son, and if she was a son, she would be a son.
He was born in a great family, and he was born in a noble family, but he was born in a humble family.
He never thought that he would be a father.
He thought that if he was a woman, he would be a woman.

main_topics: Philosophical musings on gender and identity
hierarchy.structure: The document presents a series of declarative statements and reported speech, primarily focusing on the internal thoughts and external pronouncements of a central 'he' character. It transitions from descriptions of his ambitions and current state to his past, his self-perception, and a recurring hypothetical scenario about being a woman. The structure is largely a collection of fragmented propositions rather than a cohesive narrative flow.
